gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Magic 118, Grizzlies 88
gameRecap.excerpt: The Magic defeat the Grizzlies, 118-88.  Cole Anthony, Wendell Carter and Jalen Suggs all score 15 points for the Magic in the victory, while Jordan Goodwin tallies 16 points and 11 rebounds for the Grizzlies in the losing effort.  The Magic snap their three game losing streak and improve to 43-31 on the season, while the Grizzlies fall to 24-50.
